idea-plugin.name: TxtReader
idea-plugin.description:
The plug-in provides large txt type document reading ability, the plug-in will output the content in the console. 插件提供较大的txt类型文档阅读能力，插件会将内容输出在控制台。 使用方法： 1.点击下方的"TxtReader" 2.双击空白的控制台部分，点击"txt reader" 3.选择你想要阅读的txt类型文件 异常： 如果出现乱码，可以点击左下方的编辑按钮更换编码类型。 How to use: 1. Click on TxtReader below 2. Double-click the blank console section, Click ”txt reader” 3. Choose the txt type file you want to read
ANOMALIES: If there is garbled code, you can click the edit button at the bottom left to change the encoding type.
